name: HONKER (unfinished) - GDKO Round 3 2023
description:
Round 1/2 Game TrAPPed - https://just-a-mooshroom.itch.io/trapped-gdko-2023

Unfortunately didn't get to finish this game at all. I did not have much time to work on it, and didn't get to implement any of the features I wanted to. I decided to still submit it anyways because you never know what could happen! Hope you enjoy it anyways!

Honker is a parody of Twitter, and you have to fight off the doxxers and bullies and try not to get cancelled by the Honkers.  Fight back with your own honks! (You can't take damage).

Controls

W A S D - movement

Left click - shoot

Credits

Honk sound - https://freesound.org/people/SpaceJoe/sounds/510940/  

Music - https://pixabay.com/music/main-title-risk-136788/
